title: New: Oberhofer – Gotta Go
content:
And so to another year, complete with the same retrodden stock phrases about the industry having shut down for a while, the weather being grim, and the best tunes around being those which take us away from the damp and cloud and back-to-work malaise.

January scribblings about music would be utterly lost without them.

Thank goodness for the kind people at Cooperative Music, then, who have supplied us with this, the latest pop powerhouse from 20 year old Tacoma, WA native Brad Oberhofer. It’s called Gotta Go, it’s out via Black Iris on January 12th, and its bittersweet, skyscraper-sized hooks will have you singing from your seat on the train or at your desk or running for shelter from one of the freak gales that are enjoying a bit of a vogue at the moment. Expect a full-length from Brad and his band sometime this year.

Oberhofer – Gotta Go by Cooperative Music
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d3c
